TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to James F Perry, 01-16-1834

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to James F. Perry, Monterey, January 16, 1834. Remain quiet and " let me perish if such is to be my fate." Government would grant territorial organization to Texas if the ayuntamientos asked for it, but there should be no more conventions. General instructions for management of Austin's affairs.

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, Monterey, January 16, 1834. Remain quiet and " let me perish if such is to be my fate." Government would grant territorial organization to Texas if the ayuntamientos asked for it, but there should be no more conventions. General instructions for management of Austin's affairs.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Monterrey */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="01-16-1834">Jany 16 1834*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I wrote on the *date_mentioned n="01-14-1834">14*/date_mentioned* by mail and sent some seeds of the *person_mentioned*Mexican*/person_mentioned* cipres pronounced seepres. I now send some more. Sow them in a bed like red pepper seed—raise it so that the water will not lay on it. Water it in dry weather. Take care of the plants, they will do to transplant in two years.*/p*
*p*The last year has been one of calamities for *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, overflow pestilence and conventions. I hope this year may be more favour- able and that the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*will have no more excitements, and all harmonize amongst themselves, and with the *person_mentioned*people and authorities of *location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*. Without this, they will not prosper—on the contrary they will ruin themselves.*/p*
*p*In a moment of irritation and impatience I wrote an imprudent letter to the *person_mentioned*Ayuntam of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* in *date_mentioned n="10-xx-1833">October last*/date_mentioned* for which I have been arrested and ordered back to *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*for which place I leave soon as a *person_mentioned*prisoner*/person_mentioned*. I do not blame the *person_mentioned*govt */person_mentioned*at all for this— nry treatment has been very good since my arrest in this place, this matter will cost me some months delay and perhaps a year before I can return to make one of your *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*as I intend to do if I live to get back. I have written to *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*by mail to furnish me with the means of living in *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*. I can sell drafts on *location_mentioned*Orleans*/location_mentioned* [at] . . . [per cent] premium-— Write to me under cover to *person_mentioned*W[S. Parr]ott, merchant *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Genl [Govt*/person_mentioned* is dis]posed to do everything for *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*that can be done and are friendly and wish the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*to prosper, They are willing to make it a *location_mentioned*State */location_mentioned*or a *location_mentioned*territory */location_mentioned*organized like *location_mentioned*Arkansas */location_mentioned*and would do so if it was asked for unanimously by the *person_mentioned*Ayuntamientos*/person_mentioned*—but no more conventions.*/p*
*p*All the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*have to do is to remain quiet and let *location_mentioned*Bexar */location_mentioned*take the lead in everything.*/p*
*p*I hope there will be no excitement on account of my arrest, it will do me harm and great harm to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*—keep quiet and let me perish if such is to be my fate. I have suffered myself to be drawn into the whirlpool by the excited men and by the party spirit of the time in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*. Men whose fortunes I have labored to make have been my worst *person_mentioned*enemies*/person_mentioned*. They can now rejoice and triumph at my difficulties, but no good man will envy them their joy, nor participate in it.*/p*
*p*My advice to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*is, what it always has been remain quiet- populate the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*—improve your *location_mentioned*farms*/location_mentioned*—and discountenance all kind of revolutionary men or principles. If this advice is followed that country will prosper. So long as you belong to *location_mentioned*Coahuila*/location_mentioned*, obey the laws and the authorities of that State.*/p*
*p*I wish all the people well, even my *person_mentioned*enemies*/person_mentioned*. I have given no just cause for any one to be my *person_mentioned*enemy */person_mentioned*but no man can expect to go through with so great an enterprise as the settling of a *location_mentioned*wilderness*/location_mentioned*, under the circumstances I did, without exposing himself to the attacks of envy jealousy and malignity.*/p*
*p*Collect all the stock you can on claims due me and put them in your brand on the *location_mentioned*Chocolate Bayou*/location_mentioned* place—keep yourself clean of party and of politics and seek happiness within the limits of your *location_mentioned*farm */location_mentioned*and the circle of your *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*and personal *person_mentioned*friends*/person_mentioned*. I will join [you] in that circle as soon as I can, [and never] leave it.*/p*
*p*Remember me to the *person_mentioned*ch[ildren]*/person_mentioned* to your *person_mentioned*neighbours */person_mentioned*and to *person_mentioned*Henry*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*—to *person_mentioned*Phillips */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Eliza */person_mentioned*and dont let *person_mentioned*little Stephen*/person_mentioned* forget me.*/p*
*p*Your *person_mentioned*brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[J. F.] *person_mentioned*Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr. James F. Perry*/person_mentioned* care of *person_mentioned*S. M. Williams */person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin Texas*/location_mentioned**/p* *p*By *person_mentioned*Mr. Powel*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I send my two miniatures by *person_mentioned*Mr. Powel*/person_mentioned* for *person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*and hope they may arrive safely. Wet will ruin them as they are painted on ivory in water colors.*/p*
*/div1*
